## headersSelector variable

A selector to extract the headers of a request

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
headersSelector: SyncSelector<IncomingHttpHeaders>
```

## Example

Simple example

```ts

const prismyHandler = prismy(
 [headerSelector],
 headers => {
   ...
 }
)

```
